t: Amazon Glance Views: About Vendor Central Traffic & Conversion Data — Reason Automation
s: March 26, 2024 - In November 2020, Amazon finally made glance view and conversion data available in Vendor Central to all brands through Sales Diagnostic reporting. Brand managers have access to up to one year of glance views by ASIN by day, alongside order and shipment information.

t: What are 'glance views' on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): Hi, Glance Views show the number of times a Product Detail Page is viewed. Amazon uses customer glance views to determine demand for your product. For Vendors, demand results in Purchase Orders or sell-in, meaning that you’ll have more product on Amazon’s digital shelves.
